text: O prorok! Skazhi tem, kotoryye popali k vam v plen: "Yesli v vashikh serdtsakh dobryye mysli, Allakh znayet eto, i On daruyet vam luchsheye, chem to, chto bylo u vas vzyato veruyushchimi, i prostit vam neveriye i zlodeyaniya. Poistine, Allakh Proshchayushch i miloserden k tem, kotoryye kayutsya v svoikh grekhakh
